homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  MyCampusApp.rootScope.mobileAppName = "Cochise College";

  function exitApp() {
    navigator.app.exitApp();
  }
  try {
    function successAuth(data) {
      if (!data) {
        $.unblockUI();
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert(
            'Some error occurred. Please try again', // message
            null, // callback
            'Error', // title
            'OK' // buttonName
          );
        } else {
          alert('Some error occurred. Please try again')
        }
        navigator.app.exitApp();
        return;
      }

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['accessToken'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['refreshToken'] = data.refresh_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['providerData'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket = {};
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket[$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').erp.name] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = true;

      /* User info for logging into ERP/LMS */
      var subVal = $.jStorage.get("userSub")
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = "";
      if (subVal) {
        var userSplit = subVal.split('/');
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = (userSplit.length == 1) ? userSplit[0].split('@')[0] : userSplit[1].split('@')[0];
        console.log("user sub= " + MyCampusApp.rootScope.username);
      }
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.password = $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword");

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.isUserTenantAdmin = MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.admins.indexOf(MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['email']) !== -1;

      /*if ($.jStorage.get('setSecurityQuestion') === true){
          window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279Page2';
      }else {
          window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
      }*/
      window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
    }

    function failureAuth(err) {
      $.unblockUI();
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials", exitApp, '', 'Ok');
      } else {
        alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials");
      }
    }

    var redirectUser = function() {
      /* Check if the user is logged in */
      if ($.jStorage.get("unifyedusername") && $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = $.jStorage.get('user');
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl = 'https://' + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['domain'] + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['gatewaypath'];

        var settings = {
          "async": true,
          "crossDomain": true,
          "url": MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl + "/unifydidentity/open/oauth2/token",
          "method": "POST",
          "headers": {
            "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
            "X-TENANT-ID": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.tenant,
            "X-TENANT-DOMAIN": MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.idpTenantDomain,
          },
          "data": {
            "username": $.jStorage.get("unifyedusername"),
            "password": $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")
          }
        }

        $.ajax(settings).done(successAuth).fail(failureAuth);

      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
        /* Check if app has only guest applets */
        if ($.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = null;

          window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
        } else {
          window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279'; /* Redirect user to signin page since it doesn't have guest applets */
        }
      }
    }

    /* Check if the app is running as standalone app */
    if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
      /* Get insititution details from tenant Id */
      var settings = {
        "async": true,
        "crossDomain": true,
        "method": "GET",
        "headers": {
          "content-type": "application/json",
          "x-tenant-id": "123123"
        }
      };

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment = "prod";

      switch (MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment) {
        case 'dev':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://seark.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
        case 'stage':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://unifyed-staging.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
        case 'prod':
          {
            settings['url'] = 'https://api.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
            break;
          }
      }

      try {
        $.blockUI();
        $.ajax(settings).done(function(response) {
          $.unblockUI();
          $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', response.content[0]);
          redirectUser();
        });
      } catch (e) {
        $.unblockUI();
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.', exitApp, '', 'Ok');
        } else {
          alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.');
        }
      }
    } else {
      redirectUser();
    }

    var handleSwitch = function(btn) {
      if (btn == 1) {
        window.location.href = '#/amakerhome';
      }
    }
    var switchApp = function() {
      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.confirm("Do you want to switch app?", handleSwitch, 'Switch App', ['Yes', 'No']);
      }
    }

    var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {
      var loc = window.location;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight = true;
      if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/WhatsUp/WhatsUp") {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && $.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
        window.location.href = "#/app/Menu82/Menu82";
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else {
        navigator.app.backHistory();
      }
    }
    document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);

    var Notification = PushNotification.init({
      android: {
        senderID: "1012473507211"
      },
      browser: {
        pushServiceURL: 'http://push.api.phonegap.com/v1/push'
      },
      ios: {
        alert: "true",
        badge: "true",
        sound: "true"
      },
      windows: {}
    });

    Notification.on('registration', function(data) {
      var devicePushID = data.registrationId;
    });

    MyCampusApp.rootScope.inAppNotificationHandler(Notification);
  } catch (e) {}

  $('input:text').focusout(function() {
    $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('footerGroupIcons').removeClass('hideFooter');
    $("#bottomPoweredBy").removeClass('hideFooter');

  });

  $('input:text').focusin(function() {

    $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('hideFooter').removeClass('footerGroupIcons');
    $("#bottomPoweredBy").addClass('hideFooter');
  });
</script>

    position: absolute;

  .message_main #dropdownMenuLink,
  .message_main #dropdownAddTags,

  .message_main .progress_bar {
    margin-top: 22%;

    height: 2px;

    z-index: 1;
    position: relative;

    line-height: 0;

    height: 8px;

<div class="message_main">
  <div class="list-group-item toolbar-menu clearfix" ng-show="automatedAlerts">
    <div id="tab1" class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 toolbar-column toolbar-column-active borderNone" ng-click="selectTab('tab1')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Manual</span>
    </div>
    <div id="tab2" class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-4 toolbar-column " ng-click="selectTab('tab2')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Automated</span>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div ng-show="selTab == 1">
    <div class="proximaFont sm_webAppletContentPadding bottomPaddingMobile ng-scope">
      <div ng-show="messagingList.length!==0 || searchCase" class="">
        <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb  marginBottom15px">
          <div class="colPadding" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-6':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-3'">
            <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
              <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle greytext  backgroundTransparent" type="button" id="dropdownMenuButton" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
                <span>All Message</span>
                <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
              </button>
              <ul class="dropdown-menu multiCheckPadding" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenuButton">
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone paddingTB10 clearfix"><span class="dropChannel">Channel</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone ng-scope clearfix" ng-repeat="channel in channels" ng-if="channel.enable == true">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isChannelSelected(channel,$event)"> {{channel.channel}}
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selChannels.indexOf(channel.channelId) != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone paddingTB10 clearfix"><span class="dropChannel">Status</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Sent',$event)"> Sent
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Sent') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li clas="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Scheduled',$event)"> Scheduled
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Scheduled') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right" ng-if="$root.webApp" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-sm-6 col-xs-6 ':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-6'">
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary"  ng-click="gotonext()">+ Create <span class="hide480px"> Message </span></div>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right col-sm-6 col-xs-6" ng-if="!$root.webApp">
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="gotonext()">+ Create <span class="hide480px"> Message </span></div>
          </div>

          <div class="clearfix"></div>
        </div>
        <div style="clear:both;"></div>
        <div ng-show="selTab == 1" class="ng-show">
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px word-wrap ng-scope" ng-repeat="m in messagingList">
            <div class="font16 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
              
			  <div class="fontSize16 lineheight22" style="margin: 1px 13px -3px 13px;" ng-bind-html=trusthtml(m.shortMessage)>

			</div>
            </div>

            <div class="font12 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px">
              <div class="messageStatus" style="vertical-align: middle;">
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus == 'Sent'"><img src="images/sendSuccess.png" class="iconWidth16px"> {{m.messageTitle}}</span>
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'"><img src="images/time.png" class="iconWidth16px"> {{m.messageTitle}}</span>
                <!--<span class="font12"><img src="images/statics.png" class="iconWidth20px"> Statistics</span>
                                                                    <span class="font12"><img src="images/gallery.png" class="iconWidth20px">  image</span>
                                                                    -->
              </div>
              <div class="messageStatus">By - {{m.createdBy}}</div>
              <div class="messageStatus" ng-click="deleteMessage(m,$event,$index);"><i class="fa fa-trash-o fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></div>
              <div class="messageStatus" ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'" ng-click="editScheduleMess(m,$event,index);"><i class="fa fa-pencil fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></div>
            </div>

            <div class="font14 colorLigherGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="userPreferances btn-primary-bordered boxradius font12" ng-repeat="chl in m.channels" ng-click="messageDetail(m,chl)" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#channelPreview">
                  <span>{{getChannelDesc(chl)}}</span>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class=" text-center col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 paddingTop25px  displayTable" ng-show="messagingList.length > 0 ">
            <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle  colPadding  fullWidth">
              <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-hide="last" ng-click="loadPage(page)">Load More</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div ng-show="selTab == 2" class="">
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px " ng-repeat="m in messagingList" data-toggle="modal" data-target="#channelPreview" style="cursor: pointer">
            <div class="font18 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
              {{m.shortMessage}}
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px TopPadding">
              <div class="messageStatus" style="vertical-align: middle;">
                <span class="font12"><img src="images/sendSuccess.png" class="iconWidth20px"> Sent</span> <span class="font12"><img src="images/statics.png" class="iconWidth20px"> Statistics</span> <span class="font12"><img src="images/gallery.png" class="iconWidth20px">  image</span>
              </div>

            </div>

              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">Connect Post</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">In app notification</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">Email</li>
                <li class="userPreferances channeldisabled font12">sms</li>
              </ul>

          </div>
          <div class="  text-center col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 paddingTop25px  displayTable">

              <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="loadPage(page)">Load More</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

        <br>
        <img src="images/messaging.png">

        <br>
        <span class="fontBold fontSize16">No Message Available</span>
        <br>
        <br>
        <span class="fontSize14 fontBold" ng-show="!searchCase">You haven't created any messages yet.</span>
        <br>
        <br>

        <div style="clear:both;"></div>
        <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 text-center displayTable" ng-show="!searchCase">
          <div class="float-none displayTableCell  verticalAlignMiddle">
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="gotonext()">+ Create Message</div>
          </div>
          <br>
          <br>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="clear:both;"></div>
    </div>
    <div id="channelPreview" class="modal fade" role="dialog" ng-if="messageData">
      <!-- Preview Section Starts -->
      <div class="publish">
        <div class="carousel-inner">
          <div class="modal-dialog">
            <div class="modal-content  borderNone boxShadowNone">
              <div class="modal-header  fontSize16">
                <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">×</span></button>
                Channel Preview</div>
              <div class="modal-body">
                <div id="carousel-example-generic" class="carousel slide" data-ride="carousel" data-interval="false">
                  <!-- Wrapper for slides -->
                  <div class="carousel-inner whiteBackground word-wrap">
                    <div id="connectCarousel" class="item previewItem" ng-class="messageData.channels.indexOf('connect') !== -1?selChannel=='connect'?'active messagePreview':'messagePreview':'hideFooter'" ng-if="messageData.channels.indexOf('connect') !== -1">
                      <div class="previewContainer greyBorder">
                        <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignleft">
                            <img src="images/post.png" class="iconWidth30px" />  
                            <strong class="smallSizeDisplay">Connect Post</strong></div>
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright textcenter">
                            <label><span class="linkColor">{{connectMessageCount}}</span> / {{msgMaxCharLimit}}
                            </label>
                          </div>

                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright actionArea">
                            <div ng-class="!editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <!-- <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="editContent('connect')"><img
                                                                                                                                        src="images/edit.png"/> Edit</span> -->
                            </div>
                            <div ng-class="editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="saveContent('connect')"><img
                                        src="images/tick.png"/><span class="smallSizeDisplay">Save</span></span>   <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="cancelContent('connect')"><img
                                                                        src="images/cross.png"/><span class="smallSizeDisplay">Cancel</span></span>
                            </div>
                             
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">
                          <div class="font12 backgroundNone lightgreytext borderNone proximaFont text-left">Posted In <span class="proximaFont fontBold " ng-repeat="tags in connectTagsNames">{{tags}}{{$last ? '' : ', '}}</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="appletContent connect alignleft addscrollbar contentOverflow">
                          <div class="">
                            <div class="media">
                              <div class="media-left">
                                <div class="userImgWhatsUp" ng-if="user.profileImage != '' && user.profileImage != null">
                                  <img class="postUserWhatsUp img-sm" ng-src="{{user.profileImage}}" />
                                </div>
                                <div id="nameContent" class="nameContainer displayTable fontBold fontSize16 whiteTextColor borderRadiusCircle marginAuto pull-left img-sm" ng-style="{ background: randomBackground($root.user.firstName[0],$root.user.lastName[0]) }" ng-if="user.profileImage==''||user.profileImage==null">
                                  <span class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle textcenter text-uppercase fontSize26">{{user.firstName[0]}}{{user.lastName[0]}}
                                        <!--{{p.userName.split(' ')[0][0]}}{{p.userName.split(' ')[1][0]}}--></span>
                                </div>
                              </div>
                              <div class="media-body verticalAlignMiddle">
                                <span class="proximaFont fontBold fontSize16">{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}
                                      <!--{{p.userName}}--></span>
                                <br/>
                                <div class="fontSize12 lightgreytext">
                                  <span ng-bind="userRolestoString(user.role)"></span>,{{user.tenant}}
                                </div>
                                <div class="fontSize12 lightgreytext">Now</div>
                              </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          <div class="list-group-item borderNone no-side-padding">
                            <div id="connectMessage" class="whatsUpTitleInput fontSize16 backgroundNone colorDark borderNone proximaFont messageText" row="1" ng-bind-html=trusthtml(connectmessage)></div>
                          </div>

                          <div class="list-group-item borderNone no-side-padding text-center rounded-0 cursorPointer">
                            <div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9" ng-if="youtubeurl">
                              <iframe id="previewVideo" ng-src="{{trustSrc(youtubeurl)}}" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen target="self" class="styleIFrame embed-responsive-item"></iframe>
                            </div>
                            <div ng-if="postImage"><img class="imgFit" ng-src="{{postImage}}" />
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="smsCarousel" class="item previewItem" ng-class="messageData.channels.indexOf('sms') !== -1?selChannel=='sms'?'active messagePreview':'messagePreview':'hideFooter'" ng-if="messageData.channels.indexOf('sms') !== -1">
                      <div class="previewContainer greyBorder">
                        <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignleft">
                            <img src="images/sms.png" class="iconWidth30px" />  <strong class="smallSizeDisplay">SMS</strong>
                          </div>
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright textcenter">
                            <label><span class="linkColor">{{smsMessageCount}}</span> / 160
                            </label>
                          </div>
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright actionArea">
                            <div ng-class="!editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <!--   <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="editContent('sms')"><img
                                                                                                                                        src="images/edit.png"/> Edit</span>-->
                            </div>
                            <div ng-class="editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="saveContent('sms')"><img
                                        src="images/tick.png"/> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Save</span></span>   <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="cancelContent('sms')"><img
                                                                        src="images/cross.png"/> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Cancel</span></span>
                            </div>

                             
                          </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="appletContent inAppNotification aligncenter">
                          <div class="inputContainer AddPaddingMobile alignleft ng-hide">
                            <label>Sender Name</label>
                            <div>
                              <input type="text" placeholder="Type Sender Name" class="placeholder borderRadius4">
                            </div>
                          </div>
                          <div class="Iphone">
                            <img src="images/whiteIphone.png" />
                            <div class="messageContent alignleft">
                              <div id="smsMessage" class="whatsUpTitleInput fontSize14 backgroundNone borderNone messageText" ng-bind-html=trusthtml(smsmessage)> </div>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                    <div id="emailCarousel" class="item previewItem" ng-class="messageData.channels.indexOf('email') !== -1?selChannel=='email'?'active messagePreview':'messagePreview':'hideFooter'" ng-if="messageData.channels.indexOf('email') !== -1">

                      <div class="previewContainer greyBorder">
                        <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignleft">
                            <img src="images/email.png" class="iconWidth30px" />  
                            <strong class="smallSizeDisplay">Email</strong></div>
                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright textcenter">
                            <label><span class="linkColor">{{emailMessageCount}}</span> / {{msgMaxCharLimit}}
                            </label>
                          </div>

                          <div class="displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright actionArea">
                            <div ng-class="!editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <!--  <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="editContent('email')"><img
                                                                                                                                        src="images/edit.png"/> Edit</span> -->
                            </div>
                            <div ng-class="editMode?'displayInline':'displayNone'">
                              <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="saveContent('email')"><img
                                        src="images/tick.png"/> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Save</span></span>   <span class="cursorPointer" ng-click="cancelContent('email')"><img
                                                                        src="images/cross.png"/> <span class="smallSizeDisplay">Cancel</span></span>
                            </div>
                             
                          </div>

                        </div>

                        <div class="appletHeader displayTable fullWidth lightBorder">
                          <input id="titleMessage" ng-model="emailtitle" ng-trim="true" maxlength="{{msgMaxSubjectCharLimit}}" placeholder="Enter Title" class="whatsUpTitleInput  fontSize14 backgroundNone colorDark borderNone proximaFont messageText fontSize16" type="text" ng-class="editMode?'':'disable'">
                        </div>

                        <div class="appletContent connect alignleft addscrollbar contentOverflow">
                          <div class="list-group-item borderNone no-side-padding">
                            <div id="emailMessage" class="whatsUpTitleInput fontSize16 backgroundNone colorDark borderNone proximaFont messageText" row="1" maxlength="{{msgMaxCharLimit}}"
							ng-bind-html=trusthtml(emailmessage)>
                              
                            </div>
                          </div>

                          <div class="list-group-item borderNone no-side-padding text-center rounded-0 cursorPointer">
                            <div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9" ng-if="youtubeurl">
                              <iframe id="previewVideo" ng-src="{{trustSrc(youtubeurl)}}" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen target="self" class="styleIFrame embed-responsive-item"></iframe>
                            </div>
                            <div ng-if="postImage"><img class="imgFit" ng-src="{{postImage}}" />
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Controls -->
                  <a class="left carousel-control" data-target="#carousel-example-generic" data-slide="prev" ng-click="init()" ng-hide="channelCount == 1">
                    <img src="images/left-arrow.png" class="filledIcon24" style="top: 0;position: absolute;bottom: 0;margin: auto;right: -10px;">
                  </a>
                  <a class="right carousel-control" data-target="#carousel-example-generic" data-slide="next" ng-click="init()" ng-hide="channelCount == 1">
                    <img src="images/right-arrow.png" class="filledIcon24" style="top: 0;position: absolute;bottom: 0;margin: auto;left: -10px;">
                  </a>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <!--  Preview Section End -->
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div ng-show="selTab == 2">
    <div class="proximaFont sm_webAppletContentPadding bottomPaddingMobile ng-scope">
      <div ng-show="smpage == 'home'">
        <div id="noAutoMessage" ng-show="schedulersLength" class="textcenter">
          <br>
          <br>
          <img src="images/messaging.png">
          <br>
          <br>
          <span class="fontBold fontSize16">No Message Available</span>
          <br>
          <br>
          <span class="fontSize14 fontBold">You haven't created any automated messages yet.</span>
          <br>
          <br>

          <div style="clear:both;"></div>
          <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-xs-12 text-center displayTable ng-hide">
            <div class="float-none displayTableCell  verticalAlignMiddle">
              <div class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-click="gotonext()">+ Create Automated Message</div>
            </div>
            <br>
            <br>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div ng-show="schedulers.length > 0">
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px text-center marginBottom15px clearfix">
            <div class="red marginBottom15px" ng-show="!smDbConfig.configName || !smAppConfig.configName">
              <img src="images/time.png" class="iconWidth16px">   To activate Automated message please have App and database configuration updated. See bottom of screens for configuration!
            </div>
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-default btn-primary-bordered" ng-click="showDbConfig()">
              Database Configuration  
              <img ng-if="smDbConfig.configName" src="images/checked.png" class="iconWidth16px">
              <img ng-if="!smDbConfig.configName" src="images/incomplete-alert.png" class="iconWidth16px">
            </div>
            <div class="btn btn-small btn-default btn-primary-bordered margin10px" ng-click="showAppConfig()">
              App Configuration  
              <img ng-if="smAppConfig.configName" src="images/checked.png" class="iconWidth16px">
              <img ng-if="!smAppConfig.configName" src="images/incomplete-alert.png" class="iconWidth16px">
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px ng-scope" ng-repeat="sch in schedulers">
            <div class="row">
              <div class="col-xs-9">
                <div class="font16 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
                  {{sch.schedulerName}}
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="col-xs-3 pl-0">
                <div class="backgroundGrey">
                  <div class="pull-right padding2px10px">
                    <label ng-class="sch.running?'green-background':'grey-background'" class="switch switchCircle colPadding">
                      <input type="checkbox" ng-model="sch.running" ng-change="toggleScheduler(sch)" />
                      <div class="slider sliderCircle round"></div>
                    </label>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            <div class="font12 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px">
              <div class="messageStatus"><img src="images/time.png" class="iconWidth16px"> {{sch.messageTitle}}</div>
            </div>

            <div class="font14 colorDarkGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">
                <li class="userPreferances btn-primary-bordered boxradius font12" ng-repeat="chl in sch.channels">
                  <span>{{getChannelDesc(chl)}}</span>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>

          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div ng-show="smpage == 'dbconfig'">
      <div class="col-lg-7 col-sm-12 col-md-7 col-xs-12 float-none marginAuto paddingMobile">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 float-none marginBottom15px paddingNone verticalAlignMiddle clearfix">
          <div class="backButton cursorPointer" ng-click="gotoDbConfigHome()" ng-if="$root.webApp">
            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="font18 fontBold paddingBottom15px">Database Configuration</div>
        <form ng-submit="dbConfigSave()">
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">ERP*</label>
              <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
                <button class="btn btn-default border1px dropdown-toggle dropdownMenuLink" type="button" data-toggle="dropdown">
                  <span>{{smDbConfig.erp}}</span>
                  <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span></button>
                <ul class="dropdown-menu fixedDropdown" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenu1">
                  <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone">
                    <a ng-click="erpselect()">
                      <div class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">Banner</div>
                    </a>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">Config Name*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Give Name" name="configName" id="configName" ng-model="smDbConfig.configName" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">Driver classname*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Driver Classname" name="driverClassname" id="driverClassname" ng-model="smDbConfig.driverClassname" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">Url*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Paste url" name="url" id="url" ng-model="smDbConfig.url" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">Username*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Username" name="username" id="username" ng-model="smDbConfig.username" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="state" class="control-label">Password*</label>
              <input type="password" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Password" name="password" id="password" ng-model="smDbConfig.password" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px text-center">
            <!--<div class="btn btn-block btn-primary" ng-click="dbConfigSave()">Save and Validate</div>-->
            <input type="submit" id="dbsubmit" value="Save and Validate" class="btn btn-primary" />
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div ng-show="smpage == 'appconfig'">
      <div class="col-lg-7 col-sm-12 col-md-7 col-xs-12 float-none marginAuto paddingMobile">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 float-none marginBottom15px paddingNone verticalAlignMiddle clearfix">
          <div class="backButton cursorPointer" ng-click="gotoDbConfigHome()" ng-if="$root.webApp">
            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="font18 fontBold paddingBottom15px">App Configuration</div>
        <form ng-submit="appConfigSave()">
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label class="control-label">Alert Type*</label>
              <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
                <button class="btn btn-default border1px dropdown-toggle dropdownMenuLink" type="button" data-toggle="dropdown">
                  <span>{{smAppConfig.alertType}}</span>
                  <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span></button>
                <ul class="dropdown-menu fixedDropdown" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenu1">
                  <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone">
                    <a ng-click="alerttypeselect()">
                      <div class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">Portal</div>
                    </a>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="userMappingQuery" class="control-label">User Mapping Query*</label>
              <textarea ng-model="smAppConfig.userMappingQuery" name="userMappingQuery" id="userMappingQuery" placeholder="Write Query" class="form-control input-sm" required> </textarea>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="lastRunTimeQuery" class="control-label">Last Run Time Query*</label>
              <textarea ng-model="smAppConfig.lastRunTimeQuery" name="lastRunTimeQuery" id="lastRunTimeQuery" placeholder="Write Query" class="form-control input-sm" required> </textarea>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="myMessagesURL" class="control-label">My Messages URL*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Unifyed Messaging Endpoint" name="myMessagesURL" id="myMessagesURL" ng-model="smAppConfig.myMessagesURL" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthidpUrl" class="control-label">OAuth IDP Token URL*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="QL IDP URL" name="oauthidpUrl" id="oauthidpUrl" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthidpUrl" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthUserinfoUrl" class="control-label">IDP Userinfo URL*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="QL IDP Userinfo URL" name="oauthUserinfoUrl" id="oauthUserinfoUrl" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthUserinfoUrl" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthClientid" class="control-label">OAuth Clientid*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Clientid" name="oauthClientid" id="oauthClientid" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthClientid" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthClientSecret" class="control-label">OAuth Client Secret*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Client Secret" name="oauthClientSecret" id="oauthClientSecret" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthClientSecret" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthusername" class="control-label">IDP Username*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Username" name="oauthusername" id="oauthusername" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthusername" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="oauthpassword" class="control-label">IDP Password*</label>
              <input type="password" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Password" name="oauthpassword" id="oauthpassword" ng-model="smAppConfig.oauthpassword" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="idpTenantId" class="control-label">Tenant id*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Tenant id" name="idpTenantId" id="idpTenantId" ng-model="smAppConfig.idpTenantId" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="idpTenantDomain" class="control-label">Tenant Domain*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Tenant Domain" name="idpTenantDomain" id="idpTenantDomain" ng-model="smAppConfig.idpTenantDomain" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px text-center">
            <!--<div class="btn btn-block btn-primary" ng-click="dbConfigSave()">Save and Validate</div>-->
            <input type="submit" id="appconfigsubmit" value="Save" class="btn btn-primary" />
          </div>
        </form>
      </div>
    </div>

  </div>
</div>

<style>
  /***** Checkbox CSS *****/
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .marginleft12px {
    margin-left: 12px;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .control {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 30px;
    cursor: pointer;

  .message-secoundpage-main .control input:checked:focus ~ .control__indicator {

  .message-secoundpage-main .control__indicator:after {

    top: -65px;
    z-index: 2;
    padding: 12px 15px;
    border: 1px solid #c7c7c7 !important;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .youtubeDownArrow {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -15px;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 2;
    color: white;
    font-size: 25px;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .youtubeUrlContainer input::-webkit-input-placeholder {
    /* Chrome */
    color: #c2c2c2;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .youtubeUrlContainer input:-ms-input-placeholder {
    /* IE 10+ */
    color: #c2c2c2;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .youtubeUrlContainer input::-moz-placeholder {
    /* Firefox 19+ */
    color: #c2c2c2;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .youtubeUrlContainer input:-moz-placeholder {
    /* Firefox 4 - 18 */
    color: #c2c2c2;
    opacity: 1;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .disableCheckBox {
    opacity: 0.4;
    cursor: not-allowed !important;
    filter: alpha(opacity=65);
    -webkit-box-shadow: none;
    box-shadow: none;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .warningInfo {
    color: #525252;
    font-style: italic;
    font-size: 12px;
    padding-top: 10px;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .previewContainer .appletHeader.displayTable .displayTableCell {
    width: 33.33%;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .displayInline {
    display: inline;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .displayNone {
    display: none;
  }
  
  textarea {
    outline: none !important;
  }
  
  .message-secoundpage-main .email-style {
    text-transform: lowercase;
  }
  /*fix for app*/
  
  .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .publish .modal-content .carousel-inner {
    max-height: 63vh;
    min-height: 63vh;
  }
  
  .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .PreviewMessagefixHeight {
    max-height: 22vh;
    overflow-y: scroll;
  }
  
  .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .PreviewMessagefixHeightEmail {
    max-height: 45vh;
    overflow-y: scroll;
  }
  
  @media only screen and (max-width:980px) and (min-width:1px) {
    .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .modal {
      top: 50px;
    }
    .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .modal-dialog {
      top: 0%;
      width: 100%;
    }
    .app-content .message-secoundpage-main .modal-body div {
      padding: 0px;
      text-align: left;
      margin: auto;
      font-size: 13px;
    }
  }
</style>
<div class="proximaFont bottomPaddingMobile message-secoundpage-main" style="margin-bottom:40px !important;">

            </div>

        </div>
        <div class="col-lg-2 col-sm-2 col-md-2 hidden-xs float-none displayTableCell verticalAlignMiddle alignright">

      </div>
    </div>
    <div ng-show=audience>

                <span class=pull-right>
                            <img src=images/down-arrow.png class=filledIcon16>
                        </span>
                <span ng-if="selectedGroupMessaging.length===0">Please Select</span>

              </div>
              <div class="dropdown-menu cursorDefault" aria-labelledby=dropdownGroupLink>
                <div class="text-center whiteBackground padding5px0 borderBottom paddingTB5">
                  <form class=form-horizontal>
                    <div class="input-group greyBorder borderRadius4">
                      <input id=groupSearchText ng-model=groupSearch.group class="form-control borderNone boxShadowNone" type=text placeholder=Search>
                      <span class=input-group-btn><button style="padding:0px 11px;background: transparent;" class="btn borderNone" type=button style=""><img style="width: 22px; opacity: 0.5;" src=images/search.png></button>
                                                    </span>
                    </div>
                  </form>
                </div>

                  <li class=borderNone ng-show=!groupSearch.group>

                <span ng-if="selectedUsersMessaging.length === 0">Please Type</span>

                      <input id=IndividualUserTxt class="form-control ng-pristine ng-valid borderNone boxShadowNone" type=text placeholder="Search user" ng-keyup="$event.keyCode == 13 ? searchUser() : null" ng-model=userSearchEmail>
                      <span class=input-group-btn>
                                                    <button style="padding:0px 11px;background: transparent;" class="btn borderNone" id=srchbtn type=button style=""><img style="width: 22px; opacity: 0.5;" src=images/search.png ng-click=searchUser()>
                                                    </button>
                                                    </span>

                      <div ng-show="userSearchResult.last==false" ng-click=searchUser(userSearchResult.page,$event) class="textcenter padding10px fontSize14 cursorPointer">Load More

                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

                      <span ng-if="!$root.webApp" style="color:#000 !important;" id="datetimepicker11"></span>

                                                                </span>

                                  <span class="proximaFont fontBold fontSize16">{{$root.user.firstName}} {{$root.user.lastName}}

                                    <span ng-bind=userRolestoString($root.user.role)></span>,{{$root.user.tenant}}
